meanings.definition: relating to the science or practice of travel through the air
meanings.sent1: The aeronautically advanced plane soared effortlessly through the sky.
meanings.sent2: The pilot received training in aeronautical engineering to understand aircraft design.
meanings.sent3: The aeronautically themed party had guests dressed as pilots and flight attendants.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was aeronautically inclined, always dreaming of flying high above the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The aeronautically inspired artwork depicted colorful hot air balloons floating gracefully.
